summary: Tired of not being able to wear the humble/noble/just-cool-looking Greybeard's Robes?  This mod makes it possible!!!
descriptionHtml:
[size=2][b][u][i]﻿Info:[/i][/u][/b]
Tired of not being able to wear the humble/noble/just-cool-looking Greybeard's Robes?  This mod makes it possible!!!

After you install the mod, just go to High Hrothgar and go to the end of the long hallway (on the left when you first walk in) and a set of the Greybeard's Robes will be on a table.

Just use the robes like any other armor/clothing :)

   - To make the Greybeard's Robes look even cooler, I would suggest using[color=#3c78d8] [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45280/?][color=#3c78d8]Nerevars Greybeard Robe Replacer V2[/color][/url][color=rgb(255,255,255)].[/color][size=2]  [color=rgb(255,255,255)]I think the author did a great job.[/color][/size][/b]
[/color]
[/size][size=2][b][i][u]What I did...
[/u][/i][/b]I unlocked the ability to wear and use the Greybeard's Robes.

Since there were no default enchantments on the robes, I added the most lore-friendly enchantments I could come up with. (Future tweaks may come)

I also moved some junk around in the area where I placed the Robes. (Just some candles and clutter...nothing major)

I also gave a set of the robes and an Amulet of Talos to each of the four Greybeards to have in their inventory.

[b][i][u]Requirements:[/u][/i][/b]
- Latest version of Skyrim.

[i][u][b]Installation:[/b][/u][/i] 
Use nexus or manually drop the .esp file into your "Data" folder.

[b][i][u]Compatibility:[/u][/i][/b] 
- Compatible with all mods that involve textures and meshes.
- Compatible with all mods that do not effect the attributes of the Greybeard's Robes.

[b][i][u]Known Issue(s):[/u][/i][/b]
- There are no known issues :) 
[/size]
[size=2][b][i][u]Uninstallation:
[/u][/i][/b]AAAWWWWW....if you have to, just simply remove the .esp file from the "Data" folder or uninstall with nexus.[/size]

[size=3][color=#6aa84f]And, as always, thank you for looking/downloading...  If you like my work, please remember to check out some of my other mods :)
[/color]﻿- [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57357/?][color=#0563c1][color=#3c78d8][color=#6d9eeb][size=3][b]A Simple Little Clean Up - Breezehome[/b][/size][/color][/color][/color][/url]
[size=3]﻿- [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57535/?][color=#0563c1][color=#3c78d8][color=#6d9eeb][size=3][b]A Simple Little Clean Up - Whiterun Stores[/b][/size][/color][/color][/color][/url]

author: typhloman
